A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good time at the movies. Although i have to admit it suffered some from what i call The Potter Effect - where all the Star Wars movies are starting to blend together and it feels the same\, like the Harry Potter movies. Bad guy vs good guy\, running from bad guy\, crazy mad man\, princess escaping\, funny weird creature\, etc. I love Adam Driver\, but i find his portrayal really annoying like a naughty boy acting out. I think Carrie Fisher was best thing in the movie. I will continue to see these\, but i liked Rogue One better. Looking forward to Han Solo movie.
